Name: Cyber Girl 1.0: Booting
About the game: You will be controlling Tala, a female cyborg full of mysteries and with amazing abilities. It is time to boot up her system and help in her quest of revenge against the person who completely changed her life! In this side-scrolling action game, show and prove your platforming prowess by beating all 7 levels. Also, you can use a joystick or the keyboard to play BUT using a joystick will be more convenient. This game can support a controller for some of the in-game actions. If it does not work by default, we recommend mapping the game to the following Keyboard (WASD) and Mouse template, with the following tweaks: - Map the 'Arrow' keys to the 'Left Stick' - Map the 'Left Ctrl' key to the 'Right Grip' - Map the 'P' key to the 'D-Pad Down' - Map the 'S' key to the 'D-Pad Up' - Map the 'X' key to the 'Y' button - Map the 'Q' key to the 'X' button - Map the 'W' key to the 'B' button - Map the 'E' key to the 'Left Bumper' - Map the 'Left Shift' key to the 'Right Bumper'
